1) Before Mibugishiden was turned into a film for the big screen it
was a TV-series starring Ken Watanabe (LAST SAMURAI) as Yoshimura
Kanichiro
Official site (you must babelfish it)...took me forever to find it
http://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/mibugishiden/
***the guy who portrays Saitou Hajime in the TV-series was in SHALL WE
DANCE...

2) NHK Taiga Drama Shinsengumi is at a point where the story is
concentrating on Serizawa Kamo

3) http://www.saitou-hajime.com or http://www.saito-hajime.com is
CLOSING :(
